price: Basi mcheni Mwenyezi Mungu, na nit'iini.
footnotes: Kwa hivyo tahadharini na adhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu, na nifuateni kwa haya ninayo kuitieni kwayo kutokana na amri zake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
